text: generative AI is artificial intelligence
that uses data to generate new forms of
content like images text code and other
media it's powered by large models often
referred to as Foundation models that
are pre-trained on huge amounts of data
these models contain billions of
parameters or variables which all feed
into the AI allowing it to do things
like write articles or code solve math
problems answer questions hold humanlike
chat conversations with customers and so
much more generative AI is enhancing
human creativity it's pushing the limits
of innovation and it's helping
organizations of every size to do more
with less generative AI promises to be
one of the most disruptive Technologies
In Our Lifetime but the disruption won't
come from what the technology itself
does it will come from how you choose to
combine it with with other Technologies
the skills of your people your values
and competencies and your organization's
distinctive Vision generative AI has
powers we haven't even conceived yet new
use cases are being built tested and
discovered every day some Innovative
small and midsized customers have
already adopted this technology to solve
their most complex business challenges
they use it to detect fraud and
strengthen security uncover Trends get
predictive insights and quickly adapt to
Market changes scale operations improve
customer experiences with
hyper-personalization automate
repetitive work freeing up employees to
focus on more strategic work to get
started building your own generative AI
use case in your organization you'll
want to be sure you have the right
people processes and technology in place
from a people perspective you need a
business leader or Champion to uncover
and define specific business challenges
that generative AI can help solve a team
of employees who are ready to learn and
be curious to test and learn new ways to
solve that challenge through data and
generative Ai and experts on call who
have generative AI experience and can
provide guidance when and where you need
it from a process perspective you'll
need easy access to high quality
cloud-based data sources a strategy to
detect and mitigate bias and an
understanding of how to scale and
integrate Your solution into existing
business operations from a technology
perspective you'll need secure
infrastructure to store protect and
manage your data cost effective flexible
solutions that can grow with your use
cases and your business and solutions
that keep you compliant and able to
adhere to regulations specifically to
your industry AWS can help you on your
generative AI Journey Ai and machine
learning have been a key Focus for
Amazon for more than 20 years and now
we're on a mission to make Enterprise
grade AI technology available and
affordable for small and midsize
businesses like yours together we help
you make the most of this technology
with our comprehensive portfolio of AI
Solutions highly secure infrastructure
an expert guided and support from our
worldwide network of certified partners
and
consultants get started on your
generative AI Journey
today
